quote: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life. Don't be trapped by dogma - which is living with the results of other people's thinking. Don't let the noise of others' opinions drown out your own inner voice. And most important, have the courage to follow your heart and intuition.
name: Steve Jobs

quote: You gain strength, courage, and confidence by every experience in which you really stop to look fear in the face. You are able to say to yourself, 'I lived through this horror. I can take the next thing that comes along.'
name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: I learned that courage was not the absence of fear, but the triumph over it. The brave man is not he who does not feel afraid, but he who conquers that fear.
name: Nelson Mandela

quote: Courage is what it takes to stand up and speak courage is also what it takes to sit down and listen.
name: Winston Churchill

quote: There are no easy answers' but there are simple answers. We must have the courage to do what we know is morally right.
name: Ronald Reagan

quote: Courage is the most important of all the virtues, because without courage you can't practice any other virtue consistently. You can practice any virtue erratically, but nothing consistently without courage.

quote: Courage is grace under pressure.
name: Ernest Hemingway

quote: We must build dikes of courage to hold back the flood of fear.
name: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: Courage is resistance to fear, mastery of fear, not absence of fear.

quote: He who is not courageous enough to take risks will accomplish nothing in life.
name: Muhammad Ali

quote: Courage is not simply one of the virtues, but the form of every virtue at the testing point.
name: C. S. Lewis

quote: Courage is being scared to death... and saddling up anyway.
name: John Wayne

quote: Don't Make Assumptions. Find the courage to ask questions and to express what you really want. Communicate with others as clearly as you can to avoid misunderstandings, sadness and drama. With just this one agreement, you can completely transform your life.

quote: You will never do anything in this world without courage. It is the greatest quality of the mind next to honor.
name: Aristotle

quote: Efforts and courage are not enough without purpose and direction.
name: John F. Kennedy

quote: One man with courage is a majority.
name: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Have the courage to say no. Have the courage to face the truth. Do the right thing because it is right. These are the magic keys to living your life with integrity.
name: W. Clement Stone

quote: Faced with what is right, to leave it undone shows a lack of courage.
name: Confucius

quote: How few there are who have courage enough to own their faults, or resolution enough to mend them.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Who could refrain that had a heart to love and in that heart courage to make love known?
name: William Shakespeare

quote: Inaction breeds doubt and fear. Action breeds confidence and courage. If you want to conquer fear, do not sit home and think about it. Go out and get busy.
name: Dale Carnegie

quote: It takes a lot of courage to release the familiar and seemingly secure, to embrace the new. But there is no real security in what is no longer meaningful. There is more security in the adventurous and exciting, for in movement there is life, and in change there is power.
name: Alan Cohen

quote: A great part of courage is the courage of having done the thing before.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Have courage for the great sorrows of life and patience for the small ones and when you have laboriously accomplished your daily task, go to sleep in peace.
name: Victor Hugo

quote: He is a man of courage who does not run away, but remains at his post and fights against the enemy.
name: Socrates

quote: From caring comes courage.
name: Lao Tzu

quote: Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one's courage.
name: Anais Nin

quote: The only service a friend can really render is to keep up your courage by holding up to you a mirror in which you can see a noble image of yourself.
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Failure is unimportant. It takes courage to make a fool of yourself.
name: Charlie Chaplin

quote: Men make history and not the other way around. In periods where there is no leadership, society stands still. Progress occurs when courageous, skillful leaders seize the opportunity to change things for the better.
name: Harry S. Truman

quote: The most courageous act is still to think for yourself. Aloud.
name: Coco Chanel

quote: Those who lack the courage will always find a philosophy to justify it.
name: Albert Camus

quote: Success is never final, failure is never fatal. It's courage that counts.
name: John Wooden

quote: Courage is contagious. When a brave man takes a stand, the spines of others are often stiffened.
name: Billy Graham

quote: Be courageous. I have seen many depressions in business. Always America has emerged from these stronger and more prosperous. Be brave as your fathers before you. Have faith! Go forward!
name: Thomas A. Edison

quote: Courage is a kind of salvation.
name: Plato

quote: Courage is fear holding on a minute longer.
name: George S. Patton

quote: Man cannot discover new oceans unless he has the courage to lose sight of the shore.
name: Andre Gide

quote: Creativity requires the courage to let go of certainties.
name: Erich Fromm

quote: What would life be if we had no courage to attempt anything?
name: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: God, give us grace to accept with serenity the things that cannot be changed, courage to change the things which should be changed and the wisdom to distinguish the one from the other.
name: Reinhold Niebuhr

quote: Courage is fire, and bullying is smoke.
name: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: America was not built on fear. America was built on courage, on imagination and an unbeatable determination to do the job at hand.
name: Harry S. Truman

quote: It requires more courage to suffer than to die.
name: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: Courage is found in unlikely places.
name: J. R. R. Tolkien

quote: Courage is the greatest of all virtues, because if you haven't courage, you may not have an opportunity to use any of the others.
name: Samuel Johnson

quote: To have courage for whatever comes in life - everything lies in that.
name: Saint Teresa of Avila

quote: Any intelligent fool can make things bigger and more complex... It takes a touch of genius - and a lot of courage to move in the opposite direction.
name: E. F. Schumacher

quote: The opposite for courage is not cowardice, it is conformity. Even a dead fish can go with the flow.

quote: One man with courage makes a majority.
name: Andrew Jackson

quote: Real courage is when you know you're licked before you begin, but you begin anyway and see it through no matter what.
name: Harper Lee

quote: I'm grateful to God for His bountiful gifts... He gave me courage and faith in myself.

quote: A great deal of talent is lost to the world for want of a little courage. Every day sends to their graves obscure men whose timidity prevented them from making a first effort.

quote: The secret to happiness is freedom... And the secret to freedom is courage.
name: Thucydides

quote: A lot of people do not muster the courage to live their dreams because they are afraid to die.
name: Les Brown

quote: We must have courage to bet on our ideas, to take the calculated risk, and to act. Everyday living requires courage if life is to be effective and bring happiness.

quote: We have a powerful potential in out youth, and we must have the courage to change old ideas and practices so that we may direct their power toward good ends.

quote: Courage - a perfect sensibility of the measure of danger, and a mental willingness to endure it.

quote: If you are lucky enough to find a way of life you love, you have to find the courage to live it.
name: John Irving

quote: Courage is not the absence of despair it is, rather, the capacity to move ahead in spite of despair.

quote: Courage is being afraid but going on anyhow.
name: Dan Rather

quote: Clear thinking requires courage rather than intelligence.
name: Thomas Szasz

quote: People with courage and character always seem sinister to the rest.

quote: Do not lose courage in considering your own imperfections.

quote: The best protection any woman can have... is courage.

quote: The trials on the road to world harmony are no greater than the courage of those who accept the challenge.

quote: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.

quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.

quote: We gain strength, and courage, and confidence by each experience in which we really stop to look fear in the face... we must do that which we think we cannot.

quote: God grant me the serenity to accept the things I cannot change, the courage to change the things I can, and the wisdom to know the difference.

name: Epicurus

name: Ronald Reagan

quote: It is curious that physical courage should be so common in the world and moral courage so rare.
name: Mark Twain

quote: Wisdom, compassion, and courage are the three universally recognized moral qualities of men.
name: Confucius

quote: Courage is rightly esteemed the first of human qualities... because it is the quality which guarantees all others.
name: Winston Churchill

quote: A nation which has forgotten the quality of courage which in the past has been brought to public life is not as likely to insist upon or regard that quality in its chosen leaders today - and in fact we have forgotten.

name: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: Do you really think it is weakness that yields to temptation? I tell you that there are terrible temptations which it requires strength, strength and courage to yield to.

quote: It takes courage to grow up and become who you really are.
name: e. e. cummings

quote: The courage of life is often a less dramatic spectacle than the courage of a final moment but it is no less a magnificent mixture of triumph and tragedy.

quote: He who has faith has... an inward reservoir of courage, hope, confidence, calmness, and assuring trust that all will come out well - even though to the world it may appear to come out most badly.
name: B. C. Forbes

quote: Courage is the first of human qualities because it is the quality which guarantees the others.
name: Aristotle

quote: The greatest test of courage on earth is to bear defeat without losing heart.
name: Robert Green Ingersoll

quote: Every man has his own courage, and is betrayed because he seeks in himself the courage of other persons.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Courage is a mean with regard to fear and confidence.

quote: My message, especially to young people is to have courage to think differently, courage to invent, to travel the unexplored path, courage to discover the impossible and to conquer the problems and succeed. These are great qualities that they must work towards. This is my message to the young people.

quote: A man of great common sense and good taste - meaning thereby a man without originality or moral courage.
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: It is only through labor and painful effort, by grim energy and resolute courage, that we move on to better things.
name: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: I never thought much of the courage of a lion tamer. Inside the cage he is at least safe from people.
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: True courage is being afraid, and going ahead and doing your job anyhow, that's what courage is.
name: Norman Schwarzkopf

quote: Courtesy is as much a mark of a gentleman as courage.
name: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: He's a man of great common sense and good taste - meaning thereby a man without originality or moral courage.
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Courage is like love it must have hope for nourishment.
name: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: Courage is knowing what not to fear.
name: Plato

quote: Real nobility is based on scorn, courage, and profound indifference.
name: Albert Camus

quote: It takes a lot of courage to show your dreams to someone else.
name: Erma Bombeck

quote: My message to you all is of hope, courage and confidence. Let us mobilize all our resources in a systematic and organized way and tackle the grave issues that confront us with grim determination and discipline worthy of a great nation.

quote: Believers, look up - take courage. The angels are nearer than you think.
name: Billy Graham

quote: God grant me the courage not to give up what I think is right even though I think it is hopeless.
name: Chester W. Nimitz

quote: Change will never happen when people lack the ability and courage to see themselves for who they are.

quote: Character contributes to beauty. It fortifies a woman as her youth fades. A mode of conduct, a standard of courage, discipline, fortitude, and integrity can do a great deal to make a woman beautiful.

quote: A mode of conduct, a standard of courage, discipline, fortitude and integrity can do a great deal to make a woman beautiful.
name: Jacqueline Bisset

quote: Give us grace and strength to forbear and to persevere. Give us courage and gaiety and the quiet mind, spare to us our friends, soften to us our enemies.

quote: Most of us have far more courage than we ever dreamed we possessed.
name: Dale Carnegie

quote: Life is to be entered upon with courage.

quote: Every human being on this earth is born with a tragedy, and it isn't original sin. He's born with the tragedy that he has to grow up... a lot of people don't have the courage to do it.

quote: I've been through it all, baby, I'm mother courage.

quote: And I love that even in the toughest moments, when we're all sweating it - when we're worried that the bill won't pass, and it seems like all is lost - Barack never lets himself get distracted by the chatter and the noise. Just like his grandmother, he just keeps getting up and moving forward... with patience and wisdom, and courage and grace.

quote: Untutored courage is useless in the face of educated bullets.
name: George S. Patton

quote: Courage is almost a contradiction in terms. It means a strong desire to live taking the form of readiness to die.
name: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quote: The first virtue in a soldier is endurance of fatigue courage is only the second virtue.
name: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: There can be no failure to a man who has not lost his courage, his character, his self respect, or his self-confidence. He is still a King.
name: Orison Swett Marden

name: Karl Von Clausewitz

name: Bertrand Russell

quote: Sometimes even to live is an act of courage.
name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: Healing takes courage, and we all have courage, even if we have to dig a little to find it.

name: Dennis Prager

quote: If human beings had genuine courage, they'd wear their costumes every day of the year, not just on Halloween.
name: Doug Coupland

quote: There is nothing in the world so much admired as a man who knows how to bear unhappiness with courage.
name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: I have seen in the Halls of Congress more idealism, more humanness, more compassion, more profiles of courage than in any other institution that I have ever known.

quote: Courage and grace are a formidable mixture. The only place to see it is in the bullring.
name: Marlene Dietrich

quote: No matter what you think about the Iraq war, there is one thing we can all agree on for the next days - we have to salute the courage and bravery of those who are risking their lives to vote and those brave Iraqi and American soldiers fighting to protect their right to vote.
name: Hillary Clinton

quote: The courage we desire and prize is not the courage to die decently, but to live manfully.

quote: Just remaining quietly in the presence of God, listening to Him, being attentive to Him, requires a lot of courage and know-how.

quote: The paradox of courage is that a man must be a little careless of his life even in order to keep it.
name: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quote: Just as courage imperils life, fear protects it.
name: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: There can be no great courage where there is no confidence or assurance, and half the battle is in the conviction that we can do what we undertake.
name: Orison Swett Marden

quote: We need men with moral courage to speak and write their real thoughts, and to stand by their convictions, even to the very death.
name: Robert Green Ingersoll

quote: The weak in courage is strong in cunning.
name: William Blake

quote: Freedom is the sure possession of those alone who have the courage to defend it.
name: Pericles

quote: You will find as you grow older that courage is the rarest of all qualities to be found in public life.
name: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: Every day begins with an act of courage and hope: getting out of bed.
name: Mason Cooley

quote: A team is where a boy can prove his courage on his own. A gang is where a coward goes to hide.
name: Mickey Mantle

quote: Each person has inside a basic decency and goodness. If he listens to it and acts on it, he is giving a great deal of what it is the world needs most. It is not complicated but it takes courage. It takes courage for a person to listen to his own goodness and act on it.
name: Pablo Casals

quote: It is a blessed thing that in every age some one has had the individuality enough and courage enough to stand by his own convictions.

quote: The opposite of courage in our society is not cowardice, it is conformity.
name: Rollo May

quote: Perfect courage is to do without witnesses what one would be capable of doing with the world looking on.
name: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: Courage can't see around corners but goes around them anyway.
name: Mignon McLaughlin

quote: Courage and willingness to just go for it, whether it is a conversation or a spontaneous trip or trying new things that are scary - it is a really attractive quality.

quote: Earth teach me to forget myself as melted snow forgets its life. Earth teach me resignation as the leaves which die in the fall. Earth teach me courage as the tree which stands all alone. Earth teach me regeneration as the seed which rises in the spring.
name: William Alexander

quote: The only courage that matters is the kind that gets you from one moment to the next.
name: Mignon McLaughlin

quote: Half a century ago, the amazing courage of Rosa Parks, the visionary leadership of Martin Luther King, and the inspirational actions of the civil rights movement led politicians to write equality into the law and make real the promise of America for all her citizens.
name: David Cameron

quote: Courage and perseverance have a magical talisman, before which difficulties disappear and obstacles vanish into air.
name: John Quincy Adams

quote: In the Soviet army it takes more courage to retreat than advance.
name: Joseph Stalin

quote: Courage without conscience is a wild beast.
name: Robert Green Ingersoll

quote: Eccentricity has always abounded when and where strength of character had abounded and the amount of eccentricity in a society has generally been proportional to the amount of genius, mental vigor, and courage which it contained.
name: John Stuart Mill

quote: Why should we honour those that die upon the field of battle? A man may show as reckless a courage in entering into the abyss of himself.
name: William Butler Yeats

quote: Let's drink to the spirit of gallantry and courage that made a strange Heaven out of unbelievable Hell, and let's drink to the hope that one day this country of ours, which we love so much, will find dignity and greatness and peace again.
name: Noel Coward

quote: To dare to live alone is the rarest courage since there are many who had rather meet their bitterest enemy in the field, than their own hearts in their closet.
name: Charles Caleb Colton

quote: Traits like humility, courage, and empathy are easily overlooked - but it's immensely important to find them in your closest relationships.
name: Laura Linney

quote: He who knows no hardships will know no hardihood. He who faces no calamity will need no courage. Mysterious though it is, the characteristics in human nature which we love best grow in a soil with a strong mixture of troubles.
name: Harry Emerson Fosdick

quote: Valor is stability, not of legs and arms, but of courage and the soul.
name: Michel de Montaigne

quote: It is courage, courage, courage, that raises the blood of life to crimson splendor. Live bravely and present a brave front to adversity.
name: Horace

quote: All you need is the plan, the road map, and the courage to press on to your destination.
name: Earl Nightingale

quote: Courage consists not in hazarding without fear but being resolutely minded in a just cause.
name: Plutarch

quote: To create one's world in any of the arts takes courage.
name: Georgia O'Keeffe

quote: The kind of beauty I want most is the hard-to-get kind that comes from within - strength, courage, dignity.
name: Ruby Dee

quote: Genius is talent set on fire by courage.
name: Henry Van Dyke

quote: We've begun to raise daughters more like sons... but few have the courage to raise our sons more like our daughters.
name: Gloria Steinem

quote: Despair gives courage to a coward.
name: Thomas Fuller

quote: Life is the most exciting opportunity we have. But we have one shot. You graduate from college once, and that's it. You're going out of that nest. And you have to find that courage that's deep, deep, deep in there. Every step of the way.
name: Andrew Shue

quote: He that fails in his endeavors after wealth or power will not long retain either honesty or courage.
name: Samuel Johnson

quote: Either life entails courage, or it ceases to be life.
name: E. M. Forster

quote: Courage stands halfway between cowardice and rashness, one of which is a lack, the other an excess of courage.
name: Plutarch

quote: Everyone has talent. What is rare is the courage to follow the talent to the dark place where it leads.
name: Erica Jong

quote: To persevere, trusting in what hopes he has, is courage in a man.
name: Euripides

quote: Political courage is not political suicide.
name: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: This soul, or life within us, by no means agrees with the life outside us. If one has the courage to ask her what she thinks, she is always saying the very opposite to what other people say.
name: Virginia Woolf

quote: Courage and conviction are powerful weapons against an enemy who depends only on fists or guns. Animals know when you are afraid a coward knows when you are not.
name: David Seabury

quote: Unless a reviewer has the courage to give you unqualified praise, I say ignore the bastard.
name: John Steinbeck

quote: The strangest, most generous, and proudest of all virtues is true courage.
name: Michel de Montaigne

quote: Courage, above all things, is the first quality of a warrior.
name: Karl Von Clausewitz

quote: The amount of eccentricity in a society has generally been proportional to the amount of genius, mental vigor, and moral courage it contained. That so few now dare to be eccentric marks the chief danger of the time.
name: John Stuart Mill

quote: I beg you take courage the brave soul can mend even disaster.
name: Catherine the Great

quote: The more wit the less courage.
name: Thomas Fuller

quote: I have the responsibility of over four million people, and I am in a position to do good, to be able to bring about a new life for my people, and I will continue to move in that direction. It's a burden, but it needs to be done, and you have to have the courage and wisdom to see it through.
name: King Abdullah II

quote: Then there is a still higher type of courage - the courage to brave pain, to live with it, to never let others know of it and to still find joy in life to wake up in the morning with an enthusiasm for the day ahead.
name: Howard Cosell

quote: One man scorned and covered with scars still strove with his last ounce of courage to reach the unreachable stars and the world will be better for this.
name: Miguel de Cervantes

quote: Take chances, make mistakes. That's how you grow. Pain nourishes your courage. You have to fail in order to practice being brave.
name: Mary Tyler Moore

quote: I think my mother... made it clear that you have to live life by your own terms and you have to not worry about what other people think and you have to have the courage to do the unexpected.
name: Caroline Kennedy

quote: Courage, not compromise, brings the smile of God's approval.
name: Thomas S. Monson

quote: Leaders come in many forms, with many styles and diverse qualities. There are quiet leaders and leaders one can hear in the next county. Some find strength in eloquence, some in judgment, some in courage.
name: John W. Gardner

quote: Determination, energy, and courage appear spontaneously when we care deeply about something. We take risks that are unimaginable in any other context.
name: Margaret J. Wheatley

quote: Great tragedy has come to us, and we are meeting it with the best that is in our country, with courage and concern for others because this is America. This is who we are.
name: George W. Bush

quote: Way down deep, we're all motivated by the same urges. Cats have the courage to live by them.
name: Jim Davis

quote: Suffering! We owe to it all that is good in us, all that gives value to life we owe to it pity, we owe to it courage, we owe to it all the virtues.
name: Anatole France

quote: Failure is only postponed success as long as courage 'coaches' ambition. The habit of persistence is the habit of victory.
name: Herbert Kaufman

quote: It takes as much courage to have tried and failed as it does to have tried and succeeded.
name: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quote: Today we affirm a new commitment to live out our nation's promise through civility, courage, compassion and character.
name: George W. Bush

quote: Courage consists not in blindly overlooking danger, but in seeing it, and conquering it.
name: Jean Paul

quote: Creativity takes courage.
name: Henri Matisse

quote: Courage enlarges, cowardice diminishes resources. In desperate straits the fears of the timid aggravate the dangers that imperil the brave.
name: Christian Nestell Bovee

quote: If we survive danger it steels our courage more than anything else.
name: Reinhold Niebuhr

quote: There are pretenders to piety as well as to courage.
name: Moliere

quote: Religion in its humility restores man to his only dignity, the courage to live by grace.
name: George Santayana

quote: Courage that grows from constitution often forsakes a man when he has occasion for it courage which arises from a sense of duty acts in a uniform manner.
name: Joseph Addison

quote: Have the courage to face a difficulty lest it kick you harder than you bargain for.
name: Stanislaus I

quote: To him that waits all things reveal themselves, provided that he has the courage not to deny, in the darkness, what he has seen in the light.
name: Coventry Patmore

quote: There's no mystique to acting. It's only common sense - and a bit of courage.
name: Bill Hunter

quote: Resignation is the courage of Christian sorrow.
name: Alexandre Vinet

quote: There can be a fundamental gulf of gracelessness in a human heart which neither our love nor our courage can bridge.
name: Patrick Campbell

quote: I know that if I'd had to go and take an exam for acting, I wouldn't have got anywhere. You don't take exams for acting, you take your courage.
name: Dame Edith Evans

quote: You cannot build character and courage by taking away a man's initiative and independence.
name: William Boetcker

quote: I want to encourage our people, to educate our people to have the courage to understand and fight for their rights.
name: Megawati Sukarnoputri
